<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE POWERMART SYSTEM "powrmart.dtd"><POWERMART CREATION_DATE="12/14/2016 07:17:16" REPOSITORY_VERSION="184.93"><REPOSITORY NAME="tdmdev_96_repo" VERSION="184" CODEPAGE="Latin1" DATABASETYPE="Oracle"><FOLDER NAME="JH_PRJ_RIW" GROUP="" OWNER="velamsi" SHARED="NOTSHARED" DESCRIPTION="" PERMISSIONS="rwx---r--" UUID="29ad307b-e6c9-468d-adff-f89e8af8147f"> <MAPPLET DESCRIPTION ="" ISVALID ="YES" NAME ="MPT_DOB_CHAR" OBJECTVERSION ="1" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Output Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="o_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS1" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c1_dob" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c1_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c_rest" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c_day" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="DECODE (c_day,01,12,02,11,03,10,04,19,05,18,06,17,07,11,08,12,09,13,10,14,11,15,12,16,13,27,14,28,15,20,16,10,17,11,18,12,19,13,20,11,21,15,22,17,23,19,24,10,25,11,26,13,27,14,28,16,29,18,30,11,31,21,00,00)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION =" c_rest || v_day" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM(c1_dob))) = 0,c1_dob,IIF(LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM(c1_dob)))=1,c1_dob,v_masked_dob))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v1_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(c1_dob=0,c_dob,TO_CHAR(v1_masked_dob))
" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="out_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c_dob" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c_dob" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_INTEGER(c_dob)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c1_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,1,LENGTH(c_dob)-2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,1,LENGTH(c_dob)-1)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_rest1" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(LENGTH(c1_dob)=8,v_rest,v_rest1)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,-2,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,-1,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day1" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(LENGTH(c1_dob)=8,v_day,v_day1)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" REF_FIELD ="c_dob" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Input Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" MAPPLETGROUP ="OUTPUT" NAME ="o_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" REF_FIELD ="o_masked_dob" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Output Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS1" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_rest" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_CHAR(DECODE(to_integer(i_day),01,11,02,12,03,13,04,14,05,15,06,16,07,17,08,18,09,19,10,20,11,21,12,22,13,23,14,24,15,25,16,26,17,27,18,28,19,01,20,02,21,03,22,04,23,05,24,06,25,07,26,08,27,09,28,10,29,21,30,22,31,23,00,00))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="LPAD(v_day,2,'0')" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_dd" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION =" i_rest || v_dd" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="to_integer(iif(isnull(i_dob) or i_dob=0,i_dob,to_integer(v_masked_dob)))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="final_output" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE
